Description: Rectangular limestone stela in the form of a pedimented portico; twenty-five lines of incised Greek text commemorating the death of the child Politta (5 years old), in elegiac verse.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, said to be from Memphis
Bibliographic references: Inscription / The Collection of Ancient Greek Inscriptions in the British Museum (1075)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
